name: bin_iin_lookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bin_iin_lookup.
Tool description: 
API description: This API for Lookup, check, or search Issuer card information using card BIN.
Input first 6 digits number of the Credit/Debit Card

bin.description: The first 6 digits of the credit or debit card used to identify the card issuer.
